comments:
Got the following exception when trying to rename an inner class.  

Steps to reproduce:
1.  Restart workbench.  This only happens the first time I did a refactor.  I 
cannot reproduce after the first failure.
2.  Add a breakpoint in method #printSomething(...)
3.  Rename the MyInnerClass to something else.
4.  Got the exception.

Testcase:
public class MyClass {

	int i=15;
	
	class MyInnerClass{
		public MyInnerClass()
		{
			
		}
		void printSomething()
		{			
			for ( i=0; i<10; i++)
				System.out.println("print something");
		}
	}
	
	public MyClass()
	{
		i++;
		MyInnerClass x = new MyInnerClass();
		x.printSomething();
	}
}
